title: Digital Twin Starter Pack
description: Construct the initial digital twin scaffolding for the Lewiston complex using open-source tools and AI-driven modeling.

assignments.title: RGL + Shiny Prototype
assignments.description: Build a minimal RGL/Shiny interface showing site parcels, pipeline tie-in, and volumetric placeholders.

assignments.title: Data Schema for Digital Twin
assignments.description: Define the JSON schema for assets, parcels, constraints, and FEED inputs.
